CustomField.inlineHelpText: Complaints: Formal notice, demand, or grievance filed w/ a regulatory agency. Ex: Department of Insurance (DOI) or Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB). Demands from attorneys/law firms and lawsuits would also fall into this definition. Escalation: Customer/partner is unhappy w/ product feature or service received and would like to “escalate,” or speak to someone with a higher level of authority. Severity of the escalation can increase. Ex: Executive/Social escalations
CustomField.label: Escalation or Complaint
